cart: An item has been added to cart.

simple.name: Simple
simple.desc: For static pages, no database server.

wordpress.desc: For dynamic pages, has database server, blog, authentication, user/post manager, complex functions,...

node.desc:
Dynamic pages, has database server.
Build the whole complex dynamic site from scratch.
Similar to WordPress, more performance and less redundancy.

page.name: Normal Page
page.desc:
For displaying information.
Example: about us, company profile, information about specific product or service, terms page, privacy page,...

fx.name: Functional Page
fx.desc:
Complex page.
For calculating, creating form, generating file or image, API,...
Example: contact page, product detail page with purchase system.

ga.name: Google TAG
ga.desc:
Get insights into your site with Google.
Google Tag Manager.
Google Analytics.
Google Search Console.

bing.name: Bing Webmaster
bing.desc: Get insights into your site with Microsoft Bing.

facebookAPI.name: FaceBook API
facebookAPI.desc: For displaying Instagram / FaceBook post via API.

etc.name: Miscellaneous...
etc.desc: Any service that can be integrated into the site if has document.

combine.name: Combine
combine.desc: Combine with Typography, Iconic or Mascot.
